data.text: Arɨmariar ekiar kam gɨvazɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God, Moses ko Aronɨn otarim Eleasar kamaghɨn aning mɨgei,

“Gua datɨrɨghɨn mangɨ Israelia bar men ziaba inigh. Gua gumaziba vaghvagh men ziabagh fogh da osirigh da mengegh. Eghtɨ Israelian gumazibar ziaba vaghvagh uan ananaba ko ikɨzibar ziabar apengan ikiam. Kar gumazir 20plan azeniba itiba, ko 20plan azenibagh afiraziba, me mɨdorozim damuamin gavgaviba iti.”

Ezɨ Moses ko ofa gamir gumazim Eleasar ghua, Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨkemezɨ moghɨn ami. Aning gumazir 20plan azeniba itiba ko 20plan azenibagh afiraziba bar men diazɨ, me Moapɨn danganir zarimɨn uari akufa. Danganir kam, Jordanɨn Fanemɨn boroghɨn aruem anadi naghɨn itima, Jerikon nguibar ekiam Jordanɨn Fanemɨn vongɨn iti.
Israelɨn otarir ivariam Ruben, an anabamɨn ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara, Hanok ko Palu,
ko Hesron, ko Karmi.
Gumazir 4plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 43,730plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Palun otarim, Eliap.

26:9-10 Dɨboboniba 16:1-35Ezɨ Eliapɨn otariba, Nemuel, ko Datan, ko Abiram. Gumazamiziba faragha Datan ko Abiram gumazir dapanimningɨn ikiasa aning amɨsefe. Ezɨ aning Moses ko Aronɨn akaba batuegha Koran adarazi ko me uari akuvagha Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akam barazi puvatɨgha akɨrim a gasara.

Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nguazim kuiaghirɨzɨ mati maburan torim oto, ezɨ me bar irava an aven iraghuezɨ, nguazim ua uabɨ dukuazɨ me bar ariaghire. Dughiar kamɨn, avim izaghira 250plan gumazir Koran gɨn zuibar isia, me gasɨghasɨki. Arazir kamɨn, God fofozim ko ikiangsɨzim Israelia ganɨngigha ghaze, me uaghan arazir kurar me amizim uam a damuan kogham.
Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn Koran otariba ariaghirezir puvatɨ.
Ezɨ Simeonɨn anabam, an ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Nemuel, Jamin, ko Jakin,
ko Sera ko Saul.
Gumazir 5plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 22,200plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Gatɨn anabam, an ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Sefon, Hagi, Suni,
Osni, ko Eri,
Arot ko Areli.
Gumazir kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 40,500plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.

Ezɨ Judan anabam, an ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Sela, Peres, Sera, Hesron, ko Hamul. Peres, a Hesron ko Hamulɨn afeziam. Judan otarir igharazir pumuning, Er koma Onan, aning kantri Kenanɨn areme.
Gumazir 5plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 76,500plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Isakarɨn anabam, an ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Tola, Puva, Jasup ko Simron. Puvan adarasi, me ziar kam, “Pun,” uari garɨsi.
Gumazir 4plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 64,300plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Sebulunɨn anabam, an ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Seret, ko Elon, ko Jalel.
Gumazir 3plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 60,500plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Josepɨn anabamɨn adarazi uari tuiragha anabar pumuning iti. Kar, Manase ko Efraim.
Makir a Manasen otarim, ezɨ Gileat a Makirɨn otarim. Ezɨ Gileatɨn adarasi, an ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Ieser ko Helek,
koma Asriel ko Sekem,
ko Semida ko Hefer.
Heferɨn otarim Selofehat a otariba puvatɨ. A guivibara itima, men ziabar kara: Mala, Noa, Hokla, Milka ko Tirsa.
Gumazir kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 52,700plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Efraimɨn anabam, an ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Sutela, Beker ko Tahan.
Ezɨ Sutela, an Eranɨn adarazir inazir afeziam.
Gumazir 3plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 32,500plan gumaziba bar moghɨra. Manasen adarazi ko Efraimɨn adarasi, me inazir afeziar vamɨra iti, a Josep.
Ezɨ Benjaminɨn anabam, an ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Bela, Asbel, Ahiram,
ko Sefufam ko, Hufam.
Ezɨ Bela, Art ko Namanɨn adarazir inazir afeziam.
Gumazir 5plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 45,600plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Danɨn anabam, an ovavir boribar ikɨzir vamɨra iti, an ziam, Suham.
Ezɨ an adarazir dɨbobonim, 64,400plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Aserɨn anabamɨn ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Imna, Isvi ko Beria.
Ezɨ Beria a Heber ko Malkielɨn adarazir inazir afeziam.
Aser a guivir vamɨra iti, an ziam Sera.
Gumazir 3plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim, 53,400plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Ezɨ Naptalin anabamɨn, ovavir boribar ikɨzibar ziabar kara: Jasiel ko Guni,
ko Jeser ko Silem.
Gumazir 4plan kabar adarazir dɨbobonim 45,400plan gumaziba bar moghɨra.
Israelian gumazibar dɨbobonim bar moghɨra, 601,730ɨn tu.
Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God gɨn kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei,
“Nɨ datɨrɨghɨn men anababar ganɨva men ziabar dɨbobonimɨn gɨn mangɨ nguazim abɨgh me danɨng.
“Nɨ nguazim me danɨngɨsɨ, satu gikararangɨva, nguazir ekiaba isɨva gumazamizir avɨriba itir anababar anɨng, egh nguazir muziariba isɨ avɨrasemezir puvatɨzir anababar anɨng.”
Livain anabamɨn ikɨzibar kara, Gerson, Kohat, ko Merari.
Gumazir 3plan kaba, men tongɨn ikɨzir mabar kara, Lipni, Hebron, Mali, Musi ko Kohat. Kohat, Amramɨn afeziam.
Ezɨ Amram, Livain anabamɨn guivim Jokebetɨn iti. Jokebetɨn amebam Isipɨn a bate. Ezɨ an otarir pumuning bate. Kar, Aron ko Moses. Egha guivir vamɨra bate, an ziam, Miriam.
26:60 Dɨboboniba 3:2Ezɨ Aron gɨn amuimɨn ikiava otarir 4pla bate. Kar, Nadap, Abihu, Eleasar ko Itamar.
26:61 Ofa Gami 10:1-2; Dɨboboniba 3:4Ezɨ gɨn Nadap ko Abihu, avir anogoroghezim inigha Ikiavɨra Itir God bagha ofa gamigha, aning areme.

Livain anabamɨn ikɨzibar gumazibara, kar borir iakɨnir vamɨran ikegha ghua, gumazir bar ghuribar tuziba, men dɨbobonim, 23,000plan gumaziba. Moses nguazitam abigha Livain anabamɨn adarazigh anɨngizir puvatɨ, mati a Israelian anabar igharazibagh amizɨ mokɨn. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, a Livain anabamɨn gumaziba, Israelian anabar igharazibar gumaziba sara me mengezir puvatɨ.

Dughiar kamɨn, Moses ko ofa gamir gumazim Eleasar, Israelia ko Moapɨn danganir zarimɨn uari akufa. Danganir kam, Jordanɨn Fanemɨn boroghɨn aruem anadi naghɨn itima, Jerikon nguibar ekiam Jordanɨn Fanemɨn vongɨn iti. Egha aning Israelian anababar gumazibar ziaba osira me menge.

Moses ko Aron faragha Sainain Mɨghsɨamɨn boroghɨn itir gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn, Israelian gumaziba menge. Aning faragha mengezir gumazitam ua itir puvatɨ, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn, aning ua men ziaba osira me mengezir puvatɨ.

26:65 Dɨboboniba 14:26-35Ikiavɨra Itir God fomɨra kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Gumazir datɨrɨghɨn itir kaba bar moghɨra gumazamiziba puvatɨzir danganimɨn arɨghiregham.” Kamaghɨn amizɨ, men tav itir puvatɨ, me bar ariaghire. Ezɨ gumazir pumuningra, Jefunen otarim Kalep ko, Nunɨn otarim Josua, aning uaningra ikia angamɨra ikiavɨra iti.
